thread.section_title: Hotel San Regis - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value and great location
thread.title_full: Good value and great location - Review of Hotel San Regis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pappylux
title: Good value and great location
text:
This is a very well-located mid-size hotel close to the luxury district. The surrounding is pretty quiet. The hotel is in a classic building and offers decent and in good shape rooms. The expected amenities for such class of accommodation are provided. A real valet car parking would be appreciated (public car park are nearly 1 km). A fitness room is also missing but this is seldom found in central Paris. Room service and breakfast are of good quality.
Price are not cheap but in the range of similar hotel.
